text:
# LunaChat v2.8.9
# @author     ucchy
# @license    LGPLv3
# @copyright  Copyright ucchy 2013


# --------------------  --------------------

# 
# Japanizefalse
enableChannelChat: false

# 
# 
# LOWEST, LOW, NORMAL, HIGH, HIGHEST 
# HIGH
playerChatEventListenerPriority: 'HIGH'


# --------------------  --------------------

# 
noJoinAsGlobal: true

# 
loggingChat: true

# HawkEye
# HawkEyeconfig.ymllog:  chat  true 
loggingChatToHawkEye: true

# Prism
# Prismconfig.yml
# tracking:  player-chat  true 
loggingChatToPrism: true

# 
displayChatOnConsole: true

# 
# 
globalMarker: '!'

# 
zeroMemberRemove: false

# 
showListOnJoin: false

# /ch join 
# 
createChannelOnJoinCommand: false

# 
# 
#  '' 
globalChannel: ''

# 
# 
# forceJoinChannels: ['L', 'M', 'N']
forceJoinChannels: []

# format
formatConstraint: ['%username', '%msg']

# 
# 
# %ch       : 
# %color    : 
# %username : 
# %player   : ID
# %world    : 
# %prefix   : VaultPermissionsEx
# %suffix   : VaultPermissionsEx
# %date     : 
# %time     : 
# %msg      : JapanizeJapanize
defaultFormat: '&f[%color%ch&f]%prefix%username%suffix&a>>>&f %msg'

# OP
opListenAllChannel: false

# 
# 
minChannelNameLength: 4

# 
# 
maxChannelNameLength: 20

# 
# ( or ) + () + () 
# mainmmain
# m:
# main
enableQuickChannelChat: true

# 
quickChannelChatSeparator: ':'


# --------------------  --------------------

# /tell  /msg  /r 
# 
# 
# %ch       : %player>%to
# %username : 
# %player   : ID
# %to       : ID
# %world    : 
# %prefix   : VaultPermissionsEx
# %suffix   : VaultPermissionsEx
# %date     : 
# %time     : 
# %msg      : JapanizeJapanize
defaultFormatForPrivateMessage: '&c[&a%username&b>>>&a%to&c] &f%msg'


# -------------------- dynmap --------------------

# dynmap
# dynmapfalse
sendBroadcastChannelChatToDynmap: true

# dynmap
# truedynmap
# falsedynmap
# https://github.com/ucchyocean/LunaChat/issues/68
sendFormattedMessageToDynmap: false

# dynmapWebUI
# dynmapChannelglobalChannel
# dynmapChannelglobalChannel
dynmapChannel: ''



# -------------------- NG --------------------

# NG
# NG
ngword: ['(||)']

# NGmaskmutekickban 4
# mask : NG
# mute : NGMute
# kick : NG
# ban  : NGBAN
#  
#    kickban
ngwordAction: mask



# --------------------  --------------------

# 

# LunaChat
# Vault false
enableNormalChatMessageFormat: true

# 
# 
# %username : 
# %world    : 
# %prefix   : VaultPermissionsEx
# %suffix   : VaultPermissionsEx
# %date     : 
# %time     : 
# %msg      : JapanizeJapanize
normalChatMessageFormat: '&a%prefix%username%suffix&b>>>&f %msg'

# &a&b
# false
enableNormalChatColorCode: true



# -------------------- Japanize --------------------

# 
# none/kana/GoogleIME 3
# none      : 
# kana      : 
# GoogleIME : GoogleIME
japanizeType: GoogleIME

# 
# 1
# 2
# 1
#     <ucchy> aiueo ()
# 2
#     <ucchy> aiueo
#     [JP] 
japanizeDisplayLine: 1

# japanizeDisplayLine  1 
# 
# %msg      : 
# %japanize : Japanize
japanizeLine1Format: '%msg&e%japanize'

# japanizeDisplayLine  2 2
# 
# %msg      : 
# %japanize : Japanize
japanizeLine2Format: '&6[JP] %japanize'

# Japanize
japanizeIgnorePlayerName: true

# 
# Japanize
noneJapanizeMarker: '#'
